channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The ‘Leather-Bound’ Epstein Book Reeks Of Being A Fake Plant To Implicate Trump
item.description: President Trump's claim that some of the Epstein files are 'made up' by Democrats and the FBI makes a lot more sense now.

item.title: White House celebrates low gas prices for the dog days of summer
item.description: The White House is touting low gas prices this summer, a time when more Americans are hitting the road and gas prices typically go up.
